method.name: isReached
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this element is considered as being reached by the company, 'false' otherwise.
This implementation returns 'true' if all the agents subordinate to the company are all positionned nearby the position (see "reachingDistance" value in lua file).

method.name: getPosition
method.description: Returns the sim position of this element. Used for integration.
